name: Super Gomoku Narabe: Renju
overview: Super Gomoku Narabe Renju ("Super Five Piece Line-Up Renju") is a board game adaptation for the Super Famicom developed and published by Naxat Soft. The game is played with a Go board and pieces, but the goal is to simply line up five pieces horizontally, vertically or diagonally. The game has a few modes, including a tournament mode in which the player takes on CPU opponents of increasing difficulty.
